value:
Elibe was once home to dragons, but
we have long since abandoned it. It is
now claimed by humankind.

We knew that it was forbidden, and
yet we answered Nergal's call and
opened the gate...to see home again.

Stay strong. No matter what happens,
trust yourself to overcome. That is
how I made it through hard times.

My power may be diminished, and I
may age and die as humans do, but
I have no regrets. In fact, I'm happy.

If we can realize Lord Athos's vision
of utopia here, then perhaps humans
and dragons can finally live in peace.

Oh—please, pay me no mind. I don't
think I'm really all that good at
talking to people...
A saving light shall rise...
Forgive me...

This world will once again be
enveloped by darkness...
Thank you for your kindness.

I am Ninian. I have a vision of a better
world—one in which humans and
dragons prosper together in harmony.

A question, if I may. Have you ever
heard of Lord Athos, the Archsage
of Elibe, $Nu?$k$pHe believed that humans and dragons
would one day live together in
harmony and understanding.$k$pHis vision was called Arcadia. For a
long time, a utopia like that seemed
like it might be forever out of reach.$k$pBut I have seen the seeds of such a
paradise planted, in Elibe and in Askr.
It pleases me to watch them grow.$k$pPerhaps it will take centuries. Maybe
you and I will have long been
scattered to the winds by then.$k$pNils will still be here, though. And I'd
like my brother to see a world where
both humans and dragons are happy.
My true power...
For humans and dragons!
Your gaze is harsh!
This cannot go on!
I can stand no longer.
Take this strength.
I'll watch over you.
My name is Ninian. I'm a type of being known as a dragon... Have you met many of us?
My wish is that our world will one day become a place where humans and dragons can live together. A true utopia...
Oh, hello! I was just practicing, but if you need something, I'd be glad to help.
Even if my lifespan is that of a human's... Well, I'm all right with that.
I'll support you in battle. All I ask in return is that you allow me to stay by your side.
What's your plan?
Show me what to do.
I'm with you.
